name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breadchaser - Custom networking messages & job apps with AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breadchaser transforms your networking - automating personal messages, sales InMails, and job apps with AI without sounding robotic.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want to land the job of your dreams? 🚀

I used Breadchaser to get a $115,000 tech job offer in 1.5 weeks… 

And you can too.

★ What if you could… ★

• Turn your job search into a ✨ daily habit ✨ that actually works & avoid the “ATS graveyard”?
• Craft ✨ custom cover letters ✨ that make hiring managers sit up and take notice?
• Send ✨ personalized networking messages ✨ based on proven templates to get responses & book 1st-round interviews?

In a world where everyone's shouting, be the whisper they lean in to hear.

Breadchaser isn't just another job search tool. It's your secret weapon in the battle for attention in a crowded job market.

★ The Challenge ★

The job market is a mess. You're either:

• Mass applying with zero results
• Spending hours on personalized applications
• Networking like a robot and getting ghosted

✅ The Solution is Breadchaser: Your AI-powered Job Search Wingman ✅

Breadchaser takes in your resume to create personalized outputs based on your unique profile. Breadchaser also autofills key information from your browser window to take in job post data, LinkedIn profile data, etc. to generate even more personalized outputs.

★ What You Get ★

• AI Cover Letter Generator: Craft standout cover letters for specific jobs in seconds
• Personalized Networking Messages: Connect with hiring managers without sounding like spam
• Job Application Autofill: Apply to jobs 10x faster
• 3-Day Career Launch Challenge: A proven system to land interviews fast – delivered to you via email over 3 days (for free)

★ Our Story: From Struggle to Success ★

I'm Nick, the founder of Breadchaser. In early 2023, I found myself at a crossroads after leaving my role at an EdTech startup. The job market was tough, and I was struggling to stand out.

But I wasn't alone. My friends Alex K. and A. Louis were facing similar challenges:

• Alex K. - A 👉 career switcher 👈 transitioning from real estate to software engineering
• A. Louis - A 👉 sales professional 👈 seeking higher-level opportunities in tech
• Matthew M. - An overworked 👉 solopreneur 👈 seeking a lucrative W2 career in tech sales

Together, we created Breadchaser to solve our biggest job search pain points. The results? I landed a $115,000+ offer, Alex K. secured a software engineering role, A. Louis leveled up his tech sales career, and Matthew M. landed a 6-figure tech sales job.

★ Success Stories from Users Like You ★

But our success story doesn't end there. Early users have found success across various tech roles:

• Evan R. - From unsure college grad to tech sales SDR w/o any sales experience
• Jonathan K. - From unstable job to $75k/year at major university
• Alena Y. - From unemployed bootcamp grad to $80k UI/UX designer in FinTech
• Martin J. - From stressed Product Support Specialist to dream role of Product Manager at $120,000 salary

★ Real Results ★

"Hey Nick, before diving into this interview, I just want to say I really liked your application. Not only did you actually submit your cover letter, but you even reached out to me and I could tell it wasn't one of those generic LinkedIn messages. What I'm trying to say is... You're starting on the right foot."
-Marketing Director who offered Nick a $115,000+ job

★ The 80/20 of Job Searching ★

20% of your efforts lead to 80% of your results. Breadchaser focuses on that crucial 20%:

• Targeted applications
• Personalized outreach
• Daily consistency

★ The Breadchaser Method ★

1) Find a job post (2 minutes)
2) Autofill the application (30 seconds)
3) Generate a personalized cover letter (30 seconds)
4) Connect with 3 key people: the hiring manager, department manager, and peer (2 minutes)
5) Repeat 5 times daily

Total time: 30-45 minutes per day

★ Why Breadchaser Works ★

• Submit more AND better job applications → personalized cover letters
• Book interviews via effective networking → using proven message templates
• Make a decision to evolve → commit to a 30-45 minute daily process
• Get multiple offers → leverage true negotiating power to land the job of your dreams

★ Free vs. Pro ★

Free: 100 tokens per day (enough for 5 custom cover letters & 5 networking messages per day):

• AI Cover Letters
• AI Answers to Tricky Job App Questions
• AI Networking Messages
• Autofill on LinkedIn, Indeed, SimplyHired, and more (always open to adding new sites) for job apps AND networking messages
• No GPT Key or additional setup required
• Limited to 100 tokens per day

Pro: Get everything in the Free version, but with unlimited tokens per day.

★ Bonus ★

Install Breadchaser for FREE now & get access to our exclusive "3-Day Career Launch Challenge" – a step-by-step guide to landing high-paying tech jobs – delivered to you via email over 3 days:

• Day 1: Craft a standout cover letter
• Day 2: Master cold outreach
• Day 3: Book your first interview

Don't leave your career to chance. Simply install Breadchaser today to (automatically) enter our 3-Day Career Launch Challenge & start your journey to a six-figure tech job.
